meanings.definition: Plants growing where they are not wanted
meanings.sent1: The garden was full of weeds that needed to be pulled out.
meanings.sent2: My mom asked me to help her pull out the weeds in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The weeds in the flower bed were having a party while the flowers were asleep.
meanings.sent4: The weeds in the yard were like unwanted guests that never seemed to leave.
meanings.sent5: The weeds in the vegetable patch were like invaders taking over the land.

meanings.sent1: Some weeds can grow so fast that they choke out other plants.
meanings.sent2: The farmer had to constantly battle against the weeds in his fields.
meanings.sent3: The weeds in the yard were like little troublemakers causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The weeds in the garden were like stubborn guests overstaying their welcome.
meanings.sent5: The weeds in the lawn were like pesky intruders disrupting the peace.

meanings.definition: To remove unwanted plants from a garden
meanings.sent1: I need to weeds the flower bed before planting new flowers.
meanings.sent2: She weeds the garden every weekend to keep it looking neat.
meanings.sent3: He weeds the yard with such determination that even the weeds are impressed.
meanings.sent4: Weeding the vegetable patch felt like reclaiming lost territory from the weeds.
meanings.sent5: They weeded the overgrown area, revealing hidden treasures beneath the weeds.
